nav.menuSettings.name: Menu Settings
nav.menuSettings.tooltip: Configure skill and ability menu sizes and layout.
nav.energySettings.name: Energy Settings
nav.energySettings.tooltip: Configure the Energy bar position and size.
page.menuSettings.title: Menu Settings
page.energySettings.title: Energy Settings
section.energyBarPosition.title: Energy Bar Position
config.energyBarRelX.name: Relative X Position
config.energyBarRelX.tooltip: Move the Energy bar horizontally. 0 = left edge, 1 = right edge.
config.energyBarRelY.name: Relative Y Position
config.energyBarRelY.tooltip: Move the Energy bar vertically. 0 = top edge, 1 = bottom edge.
config.energyBarWidth.name: Energy Bar Width (px)
config.energyBarWidth.tooltip: Sets how thick the Energy bar is (in pixels).
config.energyBarHeight.name: Energy Bar Height (px)
config.energyBarHeight.tooltip: Sets how tall the Energy bar is (in pixels).
config.toggleMenuHotkeysSkill.name: Skill Menu
config.toggleMenuHotkeysAbility.name: Ability Menu
config.showSkillPointButton.name: Show Custom Skill Point Button
config.showSkillPointButton.tooltip: Whether to display the skill button on custom HUD.
config.showAbilityPointButton.name: Show CustomAbility Point Button
config.showAbilityPointButton.tooltip: Whether to display the Ability button on custom HUD.
config.updateIntervalTicks.name: EXP Interval Check
config.updateIntervalTicks.tooltip:
Number of game ticks between experience checks (60 ticks = 1 second).
Default is 6 ticks = 0.1 seconds.
config.pointsAllocatedPerClick.name: Points Allocated Per Click
config.pointsAllocatedPerClick.tooltip: Number of skill points allocated per click.
config.luckSkillIsEnabled.name: Enable Luck Skill
config.luckSkillIsEnabled.tooltip: Include the Luck skill in the skill menu and EXP tracking.
config.debugMode.name: Enable Debug Logging
config.debugMode.tooltip: Enables detailed logging for skill EXP changes, point allocation, and skill tracking.
config.menuWidth.name: Menu Width
config.menuHeight.name: Menu Height
config.skillMenuVisibleRows.name: Number Of Skills Displayed at a Time
config.skillMenuVisibleRows.tooltip: How many skill rows are visible before scrolling is needed.
config.skillMenuRowSpacing.name: Space Between Each Row
config.skillMenuRowSpacing.tooltip: The vertical space between each skill row. Used to help spread out the Add Buttons.
